title: Person of Interest S2 E5 - End Scene - **SPOILER WARNING**
author: Morgs K
comment: I still like to believe that Maxine knew exactly who John was but chooses to not publish it

I'm re-watching all the seasons in preparation for season 4. Just recently finished this episode and the song they have in the end is so fitting! However, with the headset I have on, the voices come out through the left whilst the music comes out through the right. In essence, I can hear what the actual footage sounds like without music. Nifty.
this is some show. just addicted  to it

This is hands down one of the best episodes in PoI...how the story unpredictibly turns all the time, while not being chaotic...the different approach from John, not being able to protect Maxine in a traditional way...the soundtrack...alltogether really a top notch creation. One of my top favourite episodes of any show ever.
What a ending.. Love the twist with the HR boss!
description:
Ending to a fantastic episode - It's an OMG moment and it's awesome
If you haven't seen the episode I would advise against watching this
**SPOILER**
